mdMethod.name: getAllAncestors
mdMethod.description: Delegates to the Ontology Strategy to fetch all ancestors of the term.
mdMethod.label: getAllAncestors

mdParameter.description: The relationship types to fetch. This parameter can be null, and if it is null it will fetch all relationships.
mdParameter.name: relationshipType
mdParameter.label: The relationship type.

mdMethod.name: getAllDescendants
mdMethod.description: Delegates to the Ontology Strategy to fetch all descendants of the term.
mdMethod.label: getAllDescendants

mdParameter.description: The relationship types to fetch. This parameter can be null, and if it is null it will fetch all relationships.
mdParameter.name: relationshipType
mdParameter.label: The relationship type.

mdMethod.name: getDirectAncestors
mdMethod.description: Fetches direct ancestors of the term. Returns an array of TermAndRel.
mdMethod.label: getDirectAncestors

mdParameter.description: The relationship types to fetch. This parameter can be null, and if it is null it will fetch all relationships.
mdParameter.name: relationshipType
mdParameter.label: The relationship type.

mdMethod.name: getDirectDescendants
mdMethod.description: Fetches direct descendants of the term. Returns an array of TermAndRel.
mdMethod.label: getDirectDescendants

mdParameter.description: The relationship types to fetch. This parameter can be null, and if it is null it will fetch all relationships.
mdParameter.name: relationshipType
mdParameter.label: The relationship type.
